website_summaries.verdict: A unique patterned print on a polyester fabric that won't wrinkle and can be machine washed.
pros: Quickly transforms white walls with an inexpensive splash of color
cons: Would not double well as a bed covering

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, wonderful color. I cut mine and posted on canvas... love the results and it saved me a ton of $$$!
customer_reviews.author: aurorafuzz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful desert themed tapestry
customer_reviews.text: I love this tapestry! It was delivered at the time expected. It hardly had any creases or wrinkles when I took it out of the wrapping it was in. So I was able to hang it up immediately. It is definitely larger than initially thought, but it fits perfectly the way I hung it up. This is the perfect wall decor in my room, and it makes me happy every time I walk in and see it. It's not overpowering with colors or brightness. It's relaxing and tranquil. I would definitely recommend if you like cacti and succulents like I do! 🏜🌵
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Dillinger

customer_reviews.title: Urban Outfitters style without the $$
customer_reviews.text: FYI you can find this identical tapestry at Urban Outfitters for $50 dollars more #AmazonWin .....I am obsessed, this finished off my office/guest room perfectly. My images are of a queen bed with the tapestry going length wise (I purchased the "Large" size), I'm excited for my work video conferences now that I have such a beautiful background. This tapestry is very large but it is also super light weight, I was able to hang it smooth after I ironed it (don't complain about wrinkles people it comes folded) with just a few clear push pins. If I had other walls needing a makeover I would certainly purchase more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Colors are fantastic! The price was amazing! I bought the larger size!
customer_reviews.author: Bayli Shae Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as a backdrop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tapestry to use as a backdrop for my daughter’s llama themed birthday party. It went very well with the decor and looked very coordinated and cohesive. I’m so happy with the quality and size. For the price it really is a bargain and it can be used as a light throw, sheet or table cover or curtain too. The pattern is gorgeous and the cacti look like a watercolor painting. Totally happy and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zhill

customer_reviews.title: Cute & trendy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tapestry a WHILE ago! I never wrote the review. I like to make my living space nice no matter where I'm at. I have an apartment on campus in college and I was thinking of buying a headboard to feel more "homey" but honestly, I thre this tapestry on the wall with a few thumb tacks & it looks great. The cactus theme is really warm but clean.
customer_reviews.author: Thando

customer_reviews.title: A great addition for a dorm
customer_reviews.text: My daughter use this in her dorm room and she love it. The material quality is good and this would make a great gift to a teenager or college students who want to add something to their wall in a dorm room. The price was decent to compared to stores.
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Colors are soft and beautiful, and material is lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to buying the tapestry, and lots of people said it was a little more pastel than the picture from the seller; they were right, but the colors are not washed out or drab by any means. They go perfectly with my dorm room theme! The fabric is lightweight enough that it does not pull free of my command hooks (which has happened in the past with other, more dense tapestries), and whatever wrinkles that were on it from being folded and packaged for shipping smoothed out on their own. Overall I am in love with this tapestry.
customer_reviews.author: kahogg

customer_reviews.title: Go buy this tapestry!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo I was about to spend like $150 for the same exact tapestry on Urban Outfitters online... AND I am sooo glad I did not. This tapestry made all of my dreams come true! It’s beautiful and chic and boho and classy all at the same time. Love is so much! My husband and I hung it above our couch and it was exactly what our home was missing. We just moved to Arizona, so of ourselves this was the last puzzle piece to complete our home! Thank you so much- high quality and all! Only thing is I still need to iron it, even though my husband thinks we should leave it as is, well see!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: So Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for a friend and I must say I loved the packaging it was folded nicely and no weird smells came of it It is also very soft with vibrant colors not as bright as the item pictured but still almost exact since color can vary due to lighting Overall it is pretty big and great quality for the price definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Mr.&Mrs. Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Nice wall hanging
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, print quality is good, color is an off white, like an old pair of white chuck taylors. Almost tan. Packaging is light and small as is the tapesty. Check the dimensions if you're expecting something large as the picture doesn't quite get it right. Can't complain, ads a nice touch to our living room, looks authentic
customer_reviews.author: En

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this tapestry! For $12, you really can't beat it. There's a door between my roommate and I's rooms, so I use tapestries to cover it up. I wish it was a little bigger, however I still feel like it does a decent job and doesn't look too harsh in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Brubach

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I saw this same tapestry at Urban Outfitters for around $50 so I check on Amazon and snagged it for less than half the price. Totally worth the money. The white-ish background makes it transition nicely to my white wall and the pattern is bold but still somewhat sophisticated. It looks great with my real plants in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great Product for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang up in my apartment at school and I love it! The colors are so vivid and the design is beautiful! The only things is that I wish it had some loops to hang it by rather than piercing the material itself, but other than that, I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I love it and plan on choosing g one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: The wall hanging I purchased (as a gift) arrived on time. It is heavy and made with quality. I love it and plan on choosing g one for my self soon also! We live in the desert, and this gift is for someone who is very ill, who cannot travel here to be with us... so I found this, to help them think of us and have a bit of the desert there with them. Thank you for such fine work.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Jane

customer_reviews.title: The item itself seems to be good quality. The material the print is on has ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t arrive Xmas eve as promised when I ordered it but maybe that was an amazon problem? Was then told it would arrive 26th but it actually arrived 27th which is why this item got 4 stars. The item itself seems to be good quality. The material the print is on has a sateen sheet look and feel so it has a slight shine to it and is soft and smooth. The white background is actually an egg shell white which I prefer. The print Looks just like the picture advertised.
customer_reviews.author: JMJS

customer_reviews.title: For Daughter's room
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter wanted something different without having to paint. This tapestry was very cute and she hung it over her desk. Paint and material are great. She accented it with string lights and pictures and gave her room and instant makeover.
customer_reviews.author: HeartMyKids

customer_reviews.title: 10/10, and bonus points for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this tapestry for two years now. Still looks brand new. It still has the fold wrinkles in it, so maybe take a steamer to it before hanging it up. It’s nice and big, and worked perfectly for my room in college and at home. It’s as long as a full/twin xl (maybe a couple inches off for the twin xl, I can’t remember) and hasn’t frayed or anything. Definitely steam it or find a way to get the wrinkles out before hanging it though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, subdued southwestern print, nice!
customer_reviews.text: Subdued, but distinctly southwestern print of cacti with coral, browns, greens, indigo colors. We used it as a throw over our couch. Very good value for the size. Nice touch without bold overwhelming colors.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how nice this was for the price. Great as a wall hanging or clipped as a small curtain to divide space or hide parts of a room you don't want to see all the time
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Cactus Tapestry
customer_reviews.text: I'm super impressed with the price of this product because it was actually a lot for your money! I know I seem to say that about a lot of products I buy, but that's why you can't beat amazon haha. Anyway, it looks just like the picture and is super big/soft as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Use a steamer to remove the wrinkles!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture!! I used a steamer to remove the wrinkles that it came with from being packaged and that worked perfected! It adds just enough light and color to my room. The material is thin and has a plastic like coating, making it easy to work with because it’s so light weight. I hung it my putting command stips on thin close pins and have not had any problems with it slipping or falling.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Soft, lightweight, good print quality
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these tapestry’s hanging over my living room windows. I love the soft material, clear watercolor style print, and the cream colored background. I get a lot of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Mariott

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The tapestry looks better in person than online! Its soft and light and a perfect size. My home office/hideout was missing something and this really did the trick. I added some lights that I also purchased on Amazon and the room is now more inviting and has great vibes. I can tell that it will last for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Jah Studded.

customer_reviews.title: The best wall hanging at an excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: hangs Where the sun finds it for some of the day and has not faded. I will buy another soon for the same wall and I have a feeling that I will be just as pleased with the one I select then.
customer_reviews.author: techie mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful print
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Covers my entire wall and sticks to my wall with command strips. The colors are vibrant and it’s not see through :)
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: bought this to hang in my dorm alongside my fake plants and pinterest posts!! it matched perfectly and was exactly what I was looking for! I bought the small size and it was still bigger than I was expecting it to be! great price and quality; I'm happy I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I saw a cactus painting at home goods I loved but it cost $250 so I was looking for something similar when I stumbled upon this. Absolutely perfect to hang over a bed the large is about the same length as my queens size bed and really looks like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is AMAZING!!!! I love this tapestry because it is basically the same one Urban Outfitters has but so much cheaper! I previously bought this tapestry from Ebay and it was FAKE!!!! So I got this instead and I'm so freaking happy. It is exactly like the picture and the pictures that are in other reviews. The size is perfect. It does come wrinkled because it is folded up, but that can be fixed easily with an iron or steamer. Overall this is so cheap and cute if you're looking for a tapestry similar to Urban's!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for a Backdrop
customer_reviews.text: We Loved this Tapestry perfect for the theme for My Grandmother 90th Birthday I did a Cactus, Desert Bohemian Theme and So glad it came out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MARITZA

customer_reviews.title: thin material, nice picture
customer_reviews.text: the tapestry is very thin, so if you want to see the paint behind your wall, that's what you get. it's a beautiful picture just a bit thin!
customer_reviews.author: kayla!

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have had compliments on this since hanging it, I love the print and they style. I hung it loosely in my home, but I think if it were tacked up it would look better. It’s lightweight but wrinkles to much
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tapestry!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tapestry. It's beautiful, just what I wanted. I ironed it to get out the wrinkles from being folded and they came out with no trouble. Fits perfect above my queen bed. I also noticed some people mentioned the wrinkles in it. I ironed it just below the polyester setting with the design side down and the wrinkles came out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Adds a nice touch to bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered this as a temporary decoration to just add some color to our very neutral bedroom, but it looks so good over the bed I think we will keep it up! The lighter tan colors in the design match my neutral tan quilt great, and the other colors give the room a nice pop of color. It does arrive pretty creased, but nothing that can't be fixed with a little ironing. Overall super happy with it and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I cannot believe what a great piece this is for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim and I'm so glad I did. It's beautiful! I'm not sure if I'll use it as a tablecloth, hang it on the wall, or stretch it across a frame to hang it... but it will be used in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Werner

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this
customer_reviews.text: Love love love I was looking for boho chic with a bit of modern to add to my wall This works Sits above my mid century console Perfect accent and great price
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Kiljan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! I’m using it to cover my window for extra shade and to cover the horrible vertical blind we have in our office.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Exactly what it looks like in the picture. Only thing is that the wrinkles from it being packaged don’t come out. I’ve had this for over a year & they’re still there.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: This product was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product was not what I expected, I ordered to go above my couch in my den and it has turned out to be nothing but cheap. The way it looks and feels, we get comments all over on how cute our decor is but that this specific product throws it off because it looks so cheap and childish. Not what I was looking for, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful above my couch
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful above my couch. The background has some tints of very pail rose pink that i wasn't expecting. Thought it was plain white background, nevertheless i still love this piece. The fabric is nice, soft and Has a nice flow.. don't hesitate to buy this piece more than worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof5peanuts

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. It brings a summer vibe to my room. Definitely recommend!! I should have bought it sooner. What a great tapestry!
customer_reviews.author: Mia T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered this for her dorm room this year and she loves it! It's light enough that we will be able to hang it on the wall without damaging anything!
customer_reviews.author: Letitia

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was skeptical. I have wanted a wall tapestry for a long time but all the ones I’d seen that were the right size we’re about 100$. I decided to order this since I could return it if it didn’t work out, BUT this is so cute. The graphics are good, the material is microfiber, and the price was awesome. I could have steamed out the wrinkles but wasn’t in the mood, but they would come out easy enough. I’d recommend you buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsshopper15

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value!!
customer_reviews.text: This wall hanging surpassed my expectations - the print is great and it’s actually really soft! It wasn’t hard to iron at all, and that’s coming from someone who refuses to iron clothes. Just put it on the polyester setting and it took me maybe 10 minutes. I love how it looks behind my couch!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Myles

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: My daughter worked hard to earn the money to buy this and it is a huge smile. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Teen boho is nice. Silky poly fabric irons well.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this hanging. Boho style room worked out well with it. Attaching pic to show! She’s 12 so this is a popular look. I ironed it on delicate and then hung w tacks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Syljebeck

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tapestry because I love the design of the cacti. it was a good price and I was interested. I ordered this product with Amazon prime it came in the mail the next day. It came nicely folded, and didn’t have any weird smell to it. The material is a bit thin but no problems. It hangs on the wall just fine and looks great. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Seriously the cutest tapestry, it’s unique and the colors are vibrant but not over the top and the fabric is silky smooth. We just moved and I wanted something on the wall that was interesting and calming but not crazy expensive. I would/will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted something to beautify her room and this is perfect! Quality fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Tamberly Watson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tapestry
customer_reviews.text: This is a really pretty tapestry, it looks gorgeous in my Airbnb yurt...would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Material is silky. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shelllee

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with clips to hang it up so grab you one of those too. It’s nice and rather large.
customer_reviews.author: Dororhy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: SO CUTE. Went way beyond my expectations, with the price being so low. Silky material and the print is clear. I use it to cover a window in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: that the tapestry be light.  It is & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my tapestry. The colors are what I wanted. A friend told me about the tapestry or I would never thought about a great wall covering that I needed & did not want a picture. Thanks. I'm happy I found you & will be back.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne james

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful, the fabric is a little silky looking and very flowy, the colors are exactly what I expected it’s huge! I’m goring to get a frame at Ikea they have those quite easy to frame yourself. I will post a picture later, but excellent quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: elise Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Print quality is great and material is nice and not see through. I didn't expect it to be as big as it is, but I love it! Had it in my living room above my couch but ended up moving it because my cat was destroying it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors, great price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can’t expect the material to be amazing, but the colors are so vibrant and beautiful, I love it. It definitely comes wrinkled though so make sure to steam it out or something and you’ll be set. Loved this tapestry so much.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it
customer_reviews.text: The scene is beautiful and it's held up for years now. I really love it and the atmosphere it creates
customer_reviews.author: Yan Garza

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old granddaughter wanted this for Christmas. By the picture I was not sure what it would look like. The photo did not due it justice. It is very pretty. She has it proudly hanging on her wall.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H

customer_reviews.title: nice print
customer_reviews.text: This was added to our lattice fo a lttle privacy
customer_reviews.author: captbobster

customer_reviews.title: I love his tapestry it’s very light and easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I love his tapestry it’s very light and easy to put up. As a little trick to help me put it up: I bought a fabric punch and punch a hole into each of the two top corners of the tapestry. Then i put some rivets in the holes so that the tapestry can just hang by using a command hook
customer_reviews.author: Jumelles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tapestry . Colors are true as pictured. Material is a very good quality. Beautiful. just tossed in dryer a few minutes to get out the creases. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The material was slightly thinner than I anticipated, but it doesn't make it look or feel cheap. Similar to a dress scarf or light blouse. It does have some give, but it's not stretched or uneven anywhere. The picture quality is lovely, even though it's a big size. Nothing was distorted, and the color is beautiful. You could easily attach it to a frame/board of some kind to make it a little less college dorm-y if you want to dress it up a little. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alayna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Center of attention
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and very eye-catching. I bought it just to cover a blank spot in my entertainment room, but it is so nice I used it as a window treatment and may buy a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Vagabond

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The picture online doesn’t do this justice! I LOOOOOVE this tapestry. I needed something to hang in my living room and this is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, true to picture
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant when I saw the low price, but I ordered 2 different prints and both were exactly as pictured. The images are high resolution and the cloth is silky, but not fragile. I have hung them both up and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Framed this and hung it in our front office, it was the perfect solution for a large scale piece of art.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely breathtaking
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry wildly exceeded my expectations. I’ve owned tapestries of lesser quality on sites like urban outfitters for double the cost. Lightweight, soft to the touch, and the just the right size for the average bedroom. A perfect addition to any home.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Rowland

customer_reviews.title: I cut it and stapled it to the cavas and it turned out beautiful. The colors are exactly as shown and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tapestry to cover a large canvas. I cut it and stapled it to the cavas and it turned out beautiful. The colors are exactly as shown and I get a lot of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: M&J E.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely! Exactly as pictured. I'm thrilled and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely! Exactly as pictured. I'm thrilled and will order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Eley

customer_reviews.title: Really good for decoration
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the price. Could have been a little thicker...
customer_reviews.author: data accuracy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It’s a $9 print, so adjust your expectations accordingly. That being said, this is a great value - image wasn’t pixelated or distorted, colors are pretty, and it’s huge (even the medium size!). I used this for a diy-wall art project and stretched it across a frame like a canvas, then added an exterior wood frame. Total cost for a huge piece of wall art was under $30.
customer_reviews.author: Tatum

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU'RE ON THE EDGE, JUST GET IT (YOU WONT REGRET IT)
customer_reviews.text: This is so unbelievably pretty!! It’s very large and perfect for filling up a wall. The colors are vibrant and the illustration is clear! It’s such a good deal for only $10.
customer_reviews.author: cynschoettlin

customer_reviews.title: I love the tapestry
customer_reviews.text: I love the tapestry! It is for my patio at my apartment and it looks amazing. I love the feel of it also it’s not like normal tapestries which is fine with me and it’s a lot bigger than I thought it would be and that was also a great surprise! I wish I could give it more starts!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for decor
customer_reviews.text: The tapestry is very light and can be easily folded up small if needed and the image is nice and as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Jordan McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Everyone compliments this wall hang.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone likes this tapestry. It looks like a watercolor. Vibrant colors and pretty good material. Certainly not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Turned out super cute in my daughter’s room. Didn’t come with any holes for hanging, though, so we had to rig it up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Dorm room decor
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly lightweight. Going to look great in the new dorm room! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great decor when you are on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Great decor when you are on a budget! The material is nice because it isn't too sheer but thin enough that it has a nice drape to it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hawks

customer_reviews.title: It's ok I give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.text: The white color is actually an off white or cream color. The colors look kida faded. The one in the picture looks more colorful and opening.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy30

customer_reviews.title: v gud
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and high quality printing. The image is very clear and it's the cheapest tapestry I've bought with the sharpest lines. Would 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Tapestry
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I've had it for a little less than a year now and it's held up super well. Really great printing (especially for the price), definitely would recommend! Only issue I've had is it does get really wrinkled if it's tied or folded, but a steamer gets them out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this tapestry! I have received so many compliments since hanging it in my guest room. Very pretty and clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: WORTH MY $10!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just take a look at my living room! Love it so much. Worth every penny and it was much larger than I thought! Highly, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zznnggyynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: This backdrop was amazing for my Sister's baby shower. We got a ton of compliments! This isngreat quality, durable, and not cheap looking at all. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle McCrae

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a gift and its so cute, I'm tempted to get one for myself. This thing is huge and would cover a whole wall, but the print is very clear and just right.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vibrant Print
customer_reviews.text: Love! Perfect accessory to my wall. I strung some LED lights randomly and perfect night vibe to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Used for Tent; Now the Bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my tent. Yes, my tent. For camping. But now it's hanging in my guest bedroom! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayce

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very lightweight and soft, the print looks clear and high quality. I made a little frame for it. I’m so happy I filled up an empty wall for such an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughters room and she absolutely loves it. It is very nice with muted colors. It is not very flashy which she wanted. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and very cheap. The width is longer than the length.
customer_reviews.text: I expected the tapestry to be longer lengthwise l, but it ended up being longer width wise, but this will actually work better in my room. The design is beautiful and the colors are perfect. The texture is very soft; and to get the wrinkles out from being shipped folded, I just hang it with pant hangers and spray it with lots of water.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Debus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coverup
customer_reviews.text: Love! I changed offices at work, and the walls are scuffed with holes perfect solution to hide an unsightly wall. My coworkers Ooooed and Aaaahed over it after I put it up.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tapestry, Fabulous Price
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad that it looked just like the images! beautiful, lightweight tapestry and it looks great above my bed. I use it as a curtain and it filters the light well. Has obvious creases due to being folded, but that doesn't bother me at all so I hung it up right away. Been admiring it ever since :)
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Just as great as I had hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tapestry. It's such a nice, soft, and light material, perfect for hanging on the wall. I have it against a window, and it does a perfect job of acting like a light curtain. The colors are not as bright as I thought they were going to be, but it still looks great. The image is very good quality, so it doesn't look blurry or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Must have !
customer_reviews.text: This looks so beautiful in my newly boho makeover living room! I have received so many complements and it has transformed my bare walls into something beautiful! The size is so great
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Dupe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tapestry it’s just like the one on urban outfitters. The only difference is the material i have a tapestry from UO and it is very thick this tapestry was made out of a silky material but it didn’t feel cheap. The UO tapestry is like $40 and this one is much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: liyah

customer_reviews.title: Inspiring tapestry
customer_reviews.text: I love this ! It has inspired me to redecorate my master bedroom completely. Easy to hang on the wall. I just used gold tone tacks.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Richard

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Urban Outfitters
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality fabric and a high quality print. Looks great in my living room! No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bielecki

customer_reviews.title: Good for Dorm Room
customer_reviews.text: The colors are more muted in person. Great piece for any blank wall.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fabric and colors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, beautiful fabric. My daughter loves it... she has it hanging on one side of her bedroom wall.
customer_reviews.author: K. Vietzke

product_meta.title: Arfbear Cactus Tapestry, Wall hangings Yellow and Green Watercolor Printed Nature Large tablecloths Wall Tapestry 60x78.7inches
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:Large

Description：

Looking for a special piece of home decor to change your room from ordinary to extraordinary? Arfbear cactus wall tapestry is an essential elements to decorate your home.

This awesome wall hanging tapestry is very light and provides a perfect wall decor for your living room or bedroom.It is also a perfect gift for your Mum, sisters and besties. Its green plant design makes your room more vibrant.

Dimensions：

Material: polyester 

Product size: 60 X 78.7inches

Net weight: 0.66lb 

Notice:

Please wash the tapestry in cold water. Wash separately - do not wash with other items - do not tumble dry - do not use bleaches or strong washing liquids as this will cause color run.
feature_bullets: GRACEFUL ART-With cactus pattern，adds a rich, pleasing and an ethnic feel to ceiling or wall of your room, dining, drawing hall or your bed.These Tapestries are conversational piece of art.
PREMIUM QUALITY-Arfbear cactus tapestries are made from Polyester fiber that is skin-friendly and durable.It is machine washable and easy to clean .
MULTI FUNCTION-Makes a tablecloth,bed cover, beach cover up, couch cover or curtain and of course as a tapestry or a wall hanging.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED-We provide backed by 100% Money Back Guarantee,We offer Free Replacement or Full Refund if you are not Fully Satisfied with our wall tapestry. This is totally Risk-Free buy!
